channel.title: Possible App for 0x00sec
channel.description: I've tried accessing 0x00sec lately on my phone via the browser. It's definitely better then trying to access Null-Byte on my phone, but is there a possibility for maybe a stand alone app for this particular site? I was curious if there could be enough interest because I would definitely use it. Just wondering if there could be a possibility.

item.title: Possible App for 0x00sec
item.dc:creator: Cromical
item.description:
The only problem is that the app could be a complete disaster at the same time. Although it is a good idea. Perhaps lets wait- see the community grow and then decide to make such a thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Possible App for 0x00sec
item.dc:creator: Merozey
item.description:
I’d indeed love to see one too.

Read full topic

item.title: Possible App for 0x00sec
item.dc:creator: pry0cc
item.description:
A lot of people do use mobile. Do you mean just a web-view? I think the current web-application version is sufficient as of now. There are talks about Discourse making a companion app, so we’ll have to see.

Read full topic
